name: Henri Casanova
content: Henri Casanova’s Web page Henri CasanovaProfessor Follow ResearchGate Github DBLP Google ScholarI am in the Information & Computer Sciences Dept. at the University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa. My area of research fits broadly under the High Performance Computing umbrella, and I teach a range of undergraduate and graduate courses. For more information see my academic C.V. and the links at the very top.Courses:Fall 2025: ICS 312 - Machine-Level and Systems ProgrammingSpring 2026: ICS 312 - Machine-Level and Systems ProgrammingSpring 2026: ICS 332 - Operating SystemsContactemail:henric@hawaii.eduphone:808 956 2649fax:808 956 3548mail:Information & Computer Sciences 1680 East-West Rd, POST 317 Honolulu, HI 96822, USA
